Package it.uiip.digitalgarage.roboadvice.logic.operator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractOperator
    This class is just a container of properties.
    AdviceOperator
    This class manages the computation for giving an Advice.
    AssetClassOperator
    This class manages all the computations related to AssetClass.
    BacktestingOperator
    This class contains methods to compute the Backtesting.
    CapitalOperator
    This class manages all the computations related to the Capital.
    CustomStrategyOperator
    This class manages all the computations related to CustomStrategy.
    DefaultStrategyOperator
    This class manages all the computations related to DefaultStrategy.
    FinancialDataOperator
    This class manages all the computations related to FinancialData.
    ForecastingOperator
    This class manages all the computations for forecasting and demo.
    PortfolioOperator
    This class manages all the computations related to the Portfolio.
    QuandlOperator
    This class contains methods to manage financial data from quandl.
    RebalancingOperator
    This class contains methods to re-balance the Portfolios.
    SchedulingOperator
    This class manages all the nightly computation.
    UserOperator
    This class contains methods to allow registration and login of an user or to get the list of users.
